ch.ethz.csb.youscope.client.addon
Interface YouScopeProperties

public interface YouScopeProperties

Interface through which an addon can save properties as well as access the properties of the YouScope client.

Author:
langmo

Field Summary
static java.lang.String PROPERTY_DOCK_MEASUREMENT_CONTROL
          Name of the boolean property indicating if a measurement control should be docked to the main window (true) or shown in an own window.
static java.lang.String PROPERTY_IS_CONFIGURED
          Name of boolean property indicating if youscope is configured.
static java.lang.String PROPERTY_LAST_CHANNEL_GROUP
          Name of the last config group used to choose an imaging channel of.
static java.lang.String PROPERTY_LAST_MEASUREMENT_SAVE_FOLDER
          Name of the String property indicating where the last measurement was saved.
static java.lang.String PROPERTY_LAST_SCRIPT_PATH
          Last path to the folder where scripts where loaded or saved.
static java.lang.String PROPERTY_PREINITIALIZE_CAMERA_SETTINGS
          Name of the boolean property indicating if camera settings should be preinitialized.

Method Detail

getProperty

java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String defaultValue)
Returns the property with the given name, or default value if the property is not yet set or set invalidly. Properties are saved permanently, such that a property set e.g. in one session can be re-obtained in another.

Parameters:
name - The name of the property.
defaultValue - Default value to return if property is not set or invalid.
Returns:
The value of the property with the given name, or the default value.
